Name: zooniverse_id
Description: unique ID given by Zooniverse

Name: survey_id
Description: unique ID given by target survey

Name: Table
Description: match to datatable filename

Name: RA
Description: J2000.0 right ascension (decimal degrees)

Name: DEC
Description: J2000.0 declination (decimal degrees)

Name: Z_BEST
Description: best redshift selected from 4 source catalogs; see GZH paper Section 2.6

Name: GZ_MU_HI
Description: mean surface brightness within r50 (see GZH paper Section 2.6)

Name: MAG_BEST_HI
Description: ACS-GC measured mag best (SExtractor)

Name: imaging
Description: survey source of image

Name: correction_type
Description: Correction sample type: 0=correctable, 1=lower limit, 2=z<0.3, 3=NEI, 4=no redshift information (see Willett & Galloway et al. 2016, Section 4)

Name: total_count
Description: total number of classifications for this galaxy

Name: total_weight
Description: total number of votes for each response, summed over all classifications

Name: t01_smooth_or_features_a01_smooth_fraction
Description: fraction of votes for 'smooth' out of all responses to Task 01

Name: t01_smooth_or_features_a01_smooth_weighted_fraction
Description: consistency-weighted fraction of votes for 'smooth' out of all responses to Task 01

Name: t01_smooth_or_features_a01_smooth_debiased_fraction
Description: debiased fraction of votes for 'smooth' out of all responses to Task 01; only reliable if correction_type=0

Name: t01_smooth_or_features_a01_smooth_best_fraction
Description: recommended vote fraction to use. best_fraction = (debiased_fraction if correction_type=0, upper_limit if correction_type=1, and weighted_fraction if correction_type = 2,3,or 4). (see Willett & Galloway et al. 2016, Section 5)

Name: t01_smooth_or_features_a01_smooth_lower_limit
Description: lower-limit estimate of 'smooth' vote fraction corrected to z=0.3; applicable if correction_type=0 or 1

Name: t01_smooth_or_features_a01_smooth_upper_limit
Description: upper-limit estimate of 'smooth' vote fraction corrected to z=0.3; applicable if correction_type=0 or 1

Name: t01_smooth_or_features_a01_smooth_flag
Description: flag for 'smooth'  - 1 if galaxy is in clean sample, 0 otherwise

Name: t01_smooth_or_features_a02_features_or_disk_fraction
Description: fraction of votes for 'features' out of all responses to Task 01

Name: t01_smooth_or_features_a02_features_or_disk_weighted_fraction
Description: consistency-weighted fraction of votes for 'features' out of all responses to Task 01

Name: t01_smooth_or_features_a02_features_or_disk_debiased_fraction
Description: debiased fraction of votes for 'features' out of all responses to Task 01; only reliable if correction_type=0

Name: t01_smooth_or_features_a02_features_or_disk_best_fraction
Description: recommended vote fraction to use. best_fraction = (debiased_fraction if correction_type=0, lower_limit if correction_type=1, and weighted_fraction if correction_type = 2,3,or 4). (see Willett & Galloway et al. 2016, Section 5)

Name: t01_smooth_or_features_a02_features_or_disk_lower_limit
Description: lower-limit estimate of 'features' vote fraction corrected to z=0.3; applicable if correction_type=0 or 1

Name: t01_smooth_or_features_a02_features_or_disk_upper_limit
Description: upper-limit estimate of 'features' vote fraction corrected to z=0.3; applicable if correction_type=0 or 1

Name: t01_smooth_or_features_a02_features_or_disk_flag
Description: flag for 'features or disk'  - 1 if galaxy is in clean sample, 0 otherwise

Name: t01_smooth_or_features_a03_star_or_artifact_fraction
Description: fraction of votes for 'star or artifact' out of all responses to Task 01

Name: t01_smooth_or_features_a03_star_or_artifact_weighted_fraction
Description: consistency-weighted fraction of votes for 'star or artifact' out of all responses to Task 01

Name: t01_smooth_or_features_a03_star_or_artifact_flag
Description: flag for 'star or artifact'  - 1 if galaxy is in clean sample, 0 otherwise

Name: t01_smooth_or_features_total_count
Description: number of responses to Task 01

Name: t01_smooth_or_features_total_weight
Description: consistency-weighted number responses to Task 01

Name: t08_odd_feature_a01_ring_fraction
Description: fraction of votes for 'odd feature is a ring' out of all responses to Task 08

Name: t08_odd_feature_a01_ring_weighted_fraction
Description: consistency-weighted fraction of votes for 'odd feature is a ring' out of all responses to Task 08. For the GOODS 5-epoch images, t08_odd_feature_a01_ring_fraction = t08_odd_feature_a01_ring_weighted_fraction; there was no weighting applied for Task 08 alone due to the users' ability to select more than 1 response for this task. Data for this task from all other surveys are correctly weighted.

Name: t08_odd_feature_a02_lens_or_arc_fraction
Description: fraction of votes for 'odd feature is a lens or arc' out of all responses to Task 08

Name: t08_odd_feature_a02_lens_or_arc_weighted_fraction
Description: consistency-weighted fraction of votes for 'odd feature is a lens or arc' out of all responses to Task 08. For the GOODS 5-epoch images, t08_odd_feature_a02_lens_fraction = t08_odd_feature_a02_lens_weighted_fraction; there was no weighting applied for Task 08 alone due to the users' ability to select more than 1 response for this task. Data for this task from all other surveys are correctly weighted.
